dataArray.name: Skills
bullets: **Extensive Knowledge in Languages:** TypeScript and Javascript with both browser and NodeJS, Java, Swift, C#
**Extensive Knowledge using Frameworks:** Express, Sequelize, React, Joi, AJV (JSON Schema)
**Extensive Knowledge** with mobile platforms Android, IOS (UIKit) including some cross platform knowledge using React Native, Appcelerator, CrankUI
**Extensive Knowledge** in SQL (Mostly Postgres but also used Oracle, Microsoft)
**Knowledge** in NOSQL Databases (Mongo and Realm on mobile devices)
**Knowledge** of Automated Testing using frameworks like Mocha, Jest, Selenium, Cucumber, Super Test
Ability to utilize and adapt to new technologies, to learn independently
